Posts.Content: Hi everyone I’ve just joined this site after a recommendation and would really love to hear from anyone as sometimes I feel so isolated with this illness. I have stage 4 breast cancer and I take exemestane palbocyclib and zoladex. I am really suffering with depression at the moment and I am desperate to try to see the positives I still have in my life - mainly my wonderful family. I just can’t motivate myself to do anything even though I’m still physically able to. I even struggle to meet up with friends or anything like that. I’m also finding it difficult to find which bits of the site are most relevant to my situation. Obviously I’ll return any friendship offered! Any suggestions warmly received, Jx
Posts.Title: Depression and breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for response to my message. Sorry just seen it quite late but will reply properly soon. I’m in Gloucestershire I’m 46 and all the children have flown the nest! Sending very best wishes x
Posts.Title: Depression and breast cancer
